Direct-TO | June 2018 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect%E2%84%A2-flight-bag-pro]]> Inside the FMS <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/FMS2Jun18]]> <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Aug2017/IRS1Aug17]]>
Flight Management System (FMS) Logic Part Two - Approach Angle Design
Part Two of this three-part series, intended to provide pilots with a deeper understanding of Honeywell FMS vertical approach logic, covers approach angle design.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/FMS2Jun18]]>
Avoiding Wake Turbulence <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/SLOPJun18]]> Strategic Lateral Offset Procedures (SLOP)
In January 2017, a Challenger 604 flying in oceanic airspace over the Arabian Sea passed 1000 feet beneath an opposite-direction Airbus A380. The Challenger encountered wake turbulence, and lost control rolling three to five times... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/SLOPJun18]]> The RNP Corner <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/G650RNPJun18]]> G650 RNP AR Approach into Kathmandu
Kathmandu’s RNAV (RNP) RWY 02 approach allows authorized aircraft down to a 300' decision altitude using RNP 0.3... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/G650RNPJun18]]>
GNS Pilot Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/GNSJun18]]> Primary Approaches to Replace Multi-Code Approach Procedures on GNS-XL/XLS
The database change removes these Multi-Code Approach Procedures, and replaces them with a single “Primary Approach” for each runway... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/GNSJun18]]>
GoDirect Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/GoDirectJun18]]> Integrated Scheduling
Integrating scheduling, flight planning, and datalink closes the loop and gets everyone on the same page.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/June2018/GoDirectJun18]]>
